Every year I go to my mum's and we watch Comic Relief together. I always donate what I can, usually around £20. This year I've decided not to watch or donate as I don't want to perpetuate the "white saviour" image. Best of luck to everyone involved this year ❤️
Mr @davidlammy I'm pleased to say I not only didn't pledge any money to Comic Relief, I didn't even watch the show. Your praise for me would be welcome.
